segments.text: Hi ! Does this hotel have an exercise facility ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: But of course ! We have a great exercise facility .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Good . Now exactly where is it ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: It's located right under our lobby . Just take the elevator or the stairs one flight down .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Is this going to cost me anything ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: No , sir . The gym is absolutely free . However , be sure to take your room key with you .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: When does the gym open and close ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Very good . Now , is there a trainer down there ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I wish I could tell you yes , but no , there isn't .
segments.speaker: S2
